title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered: Philip Alan Lenox, Director Asia Pacific in Aqualis, acquired 176’654 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 9.77 per share on 2 June 2015. After this transaction Philip Alan Lenox, and related parties, hold 878’944 shares in Aqualis ASA. Immediate notification was not made to Aqualis’ management following the purchase of the shares. Aqualis’ management notified Oslo Stock Exchange immediately after they were informed of the purchase.
